text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed ʙa Alloh va Rasuli U, agar ʙa guruhe az ahli kitoʙ (jahudu nasoro), ki ʙa onon Tavrotu Incil doda suda ʙud, ito'at kuned, sumoro gumroh karda dar dinaton suʙha meandozand va ʙa'd az imonaton sumoro ʙa kufr ʙozmegardonand. Pas az onon hec fikr va maslihatero qaʙul nakuned
